channel.title: Changing MYSQL
channel.description:
OK I have a few questions: 1) Is it possible to add new fields? if so, how?? as in, you add in a new skill but it takes everyone off hiscores...how do i stop that? 2) How do I get it to arrange each player with max level in order of experience??
If anyone could help i would be grateful :D
